verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, When thou \w lightest|strong="H5927"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* shall give \w light|strong="H0215"\w* over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so; he \w lighted|strong="H5927"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereof over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And this \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* \add was of\add* \w beaten|strong="H4749"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, unto the \w shaft|strong="H3409"\w* thereof, unto the \w flowers|strong="H6525"\w* thereof, \add was\add* beaten \w work|strong="H4749"\w*: according unto the \w pattern|strong="H4758"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* them.

And thus shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them, to \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* them: \w Sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w purifying|strong="H2403"\w* upon them, and let them \w shave|strong="H8593"\w* all their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and let them \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* their \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \add so\add* make themselves \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.\f + \fr 8.7 \ft let them shave…: Heb. let them cause a razor to pass over, etc\f*

Then let them \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* with his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \add even\add* fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w another|strong="H8145"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and thou shalt \w gather|strong="H6950"\w* the whole \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w*:

And thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w put|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*:

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H5130"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add for\add* an \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they may \w execute|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 8.11  t offer: Heb. wave *  +  r 8.11  t offering: Heb. wave offering *  +  r 8.11  t they…: Heb. they may be to execute, etc *

And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*: and thou shalt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.

And thou shalt \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H5130"\w* them \add for\add* an \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus shalt thou \w separate|strong="H0914"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall be mine.

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that shall the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to do the \w service|strong="H5647"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and thou shalt \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* them, and \w offer|strong="H5130"\w* them \add for\add* an \w offering|strong="H8573"\w*.

For they \add are\add* wholly \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto me from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; instead of such as \w open|strong="H6363"\w* every \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*, \add even instead of\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, have I \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* them unto me.

For all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add are\add* mine, \add both\add* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* every \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* I \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* them for myself.
And I have \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* for all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add as\add* a \w gift|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: that there be no \w plague|strong="H5063"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* come \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w* unto the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 8.19 \ft a gift: Heb. given\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* according unto all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* concerning the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto them.

And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* were \w purified|strong="H2398"\w*, and they \w washed|strong="H3526"\w* their \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*; and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w offered|strong="H5130"\w* them \add as\add* an \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* made an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for them to \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* them.

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that \w went|strong="H0935"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* in to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* their \w service|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* concerning the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* they unto them.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

This \add is it\add* that \add belongeth\add* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* they shall go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w wait|strong="H6633"\w* upon the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*:\f + \fr 8.24 \ft to…: Heb. to war the warfare of, etc\f*

And from the \w age|strong="H1121"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* they shall \w cease|strong="H7725"\w* \w waiting|strong="H6635"\w* upon the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \add thereof\add*, and shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* no more:\f + \fr 8.25 \ft cease…: Heb. return from the warfare of the service\f*

But shall \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* with their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, and shall \w do|strong="H5647"\w* no \w service|strong="H5656"\w*. Thus shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* touching their \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*.
